summary: As part of FY23 appropriations, Members of Congress could request to designate a certain amount of federal funding for specific projects in their communities. While agencies often have discretion over how they award funds, Congress has directed them to distribute these funds to designated recipients. We're tracking these funds to help ensure transparency. title: Tracking the Funds: Specific Fiscal Year 2023 Provisions for the Office of National Drug Control Policy
